name: Data warden review national return rate
description: Rate of first line checker reviews being returned to reporting officers for whole prison estate.

dataset.name: Return rate for whole prison estate per month
dataset.query:
select *, ROUND((CAST(sent_back as numeric)/reports_reviewed)*100, 1) as per_returned
from (
	select Cast(Date_trunc('month', correction_requested_at) AS DATE) as month, to_char(min(correction_requested_at), 'DD/MM/YYYY') as min_date, to_char(max(correction_requested_at), 'DD/MM/YYYY') as max_date,
		COUNT(report_id) as reports_reviewed, 
		COUNT(CASE when user_action = 'REQUEST_CORRECTION' then report_id END) as sent_back,
		COUNT(CASE when user_action <> 'REQUEST_CORRECTION' then report_id END) as completed
	from (
		select report_id, correction_requested_at, sequence, user_action, prev_dw_action, following_dw_action
		from (
			select report_id, sequence, user_action, correction_requested_at,
				first_value(sequence) over (partition by report_id order by sequence) as first_dw_sequence,
				lag(user_action) OVER (partition by report_id order by sequence) as prev_dw_action,
				lag(user_action) OVER (partition by report_id order by sequence desc) as following_dw_action
			from correction_request as cr
			left join (
				select id, source, location from report
			) as r 
			on cr.report_id = r.id
			where r.source = 'DPS' and user_type = 'DATA_WARDEN' and r.location not in ('NORTH', 'SOUTH')
			order by report_id desc, sequence asc)
		where (sequence = first_dw_sequence and user_action <> 'HOLD') or (sequence = first_dw_sequence + 1 and prev_dw_action = 'HOLD'))
	group by Cast(Date_trunc('month', correction_requested_at) AS DATE))

dataset.name: Return rate per incident type per month
dataset.query:
select *, ROUND((CAST(sent_back as numeric)/reports_reviewed)*100, 1) as per_returned
from (
	select Cast(Date_trunc('month', correction_requested_at) AS DATE) as month, to_char(min(correction_requested_at), 'DD/MM/YYYY') as min_date, to_char(max(correction_requested_at), 'DD/MM/YYYY') as max_date,
		incident_type,
		COUNT(report_id) as reports_reviewed, 
		COUNT(CASE when user_action = 'REQUEST_CORRECTION' then report_id END) as sent_back,
		COUNT(CASE when user_action <> 'REQUEST_CORRECTION' then report_id END) as completed
	from (
		select report_id, correction_requested_at, description as incident_type, sequence, user_action, prev_dw_action, following_dw_action
		from (
			select report_id, sequence, user_action, correction_requested_at, ct.description,
				first_value(sequence) over (partition by report_id order by sequence) as first_dw_sequence,
				lag(user_action) OVER (partition by report_id order by sequence) as prev_dw_action,
				lag(user_action) OVER (partition by report_id order by sequence desc) as following_dw_action
			from correction_request as cr
			left join (
				select id, source, type, location from report
			) as r 
			on cr.report_id = r.id
			left join (
				select code, description from constant_type
			) as ct
			on r.type = ct.code
			where r.source = 'DPS' and user_type = 'DATA_WARDEN' and r.location not in ('NORTH', 'SOUTH')
			order by report_id desc, sequence asc)
		where (sequence = first_dw_sequence and user_action <> 'HOLD') or (sequence = first_dw_sequence + 1 and prev_dw_action = 'HOLD'))
	group by Cast(Date_trunc('month', correction_requested_at) AS DATE), incident_type)

report.name: % of reviews returned / month
report.description: Percentage of first line checkers reviews returned to reporting officers for whole prison estate per month.

report.name: % of reviews returned by incident type / month
report.description: Percentage of first line checkers reviews returned to reporting officers for whole prison estate by type per month.
